alert.note: Alert for Benton; Morrison (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 09 at 4:23PM CDT until May 09 at 4:45PM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 445 PM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN BENTON AND SOUTHEASTERN MORRISON COUNTIES... At 422 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles east of Rice, or 13 miles northeast of St. Cloud, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Granite Ledge, Morrill, Gilman, Little Rock, Mayhew and Rum River. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for central Minnesota. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
